trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around January 13th 2013
Summary: Multiple series of orange lights moving slowly and steadily over hwy 59 south near the Galleria in Houston
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from work on us highway 59 near hillcroft i saw cars stopping and pulling over to the side of the freeway taking cell phone pictures of orange lights flying in formation on 1\13\2013 at about 7:30 pm. after seeing waves of these lights i knew it was not airplanes, there was no noise. these lights were flying in a northwestern direction towards houston. i was anxious and a bit nervous. i knew there were ufos. i tried to onstar bluetooth phone to call my parents but it was not working. my cellphone did work without the onstar, however. i pulled over and got several photos on my cell phone. the lights eventually disappeared from sight. as i said, these were not airplanes, they made no noise and kept coming in formations of 3 and four lights.
